name: Glue Delivery
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/glue-delivery

Glue Delivery is my participation to the Game jam Ludum Dare 45

You can play as Louis, a delivery-man, who just had a plane accident and has to escape from an unknown jungle. The only problem?

He was delivering glue, and pieces from his airplane can stay glued on him. And having heavy airplane pieces glued on you can make your escape really difficult.

As the Theme of the game jam said : START WITH NOTHING (on you)

In this game, you'll be able to play 4 different difficulties and you can discover 3 different endings (depending on the number of pieces you have glued on you)

Controls 

Arrow keys to Move, SPACE bar to Jump

Development context

I made during the Ludum Dare (72 hours), all by myself, on Clickteam Fusion.

Credits

- Jeanne Prigent : Game Design, Art, Code

Follow me on Twitter to see my work and to have updates about my game dev adventure : Twitter
